short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it easy to see full-res images of yachts on Yachtworld, without having to click through to each image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is really hard to look at boats in detail on Yachtworld; the image carousel is janky and the images are 300px by default :( 
This extension explodes all of a boat's images into new tabs in the highest resolution available, so you can quickly see details.
